snippet: The Boy Scouts of America must release two decades’ worth of files detailing sexual abuse accusations after the California Supreme Court refused a bid to keep the records confidential.
abstract: Boy Scouts of America must release two decades’ worth of files detailing sexual abuse accusations after California Supreme Court refuses organization’s bid to keep the records confidential.
lead_paragraph: The Boy Scouts of America must release two decades’ worth of files detailing sexual abuse accusations after the California Supreme Court refused a bid to keep the records confidential.

headline.main: California: Scouts Told to Release Files
headline.print_headline: California: Scouts Told to Release Files
